title: Short and suite
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart
brief_description: A colour cocktail by Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart, translating into moving patterns of colour and light the moods of music written for a jazz ensemble by Eldon Rathburn. Inscribed and coloured directly on film. (Awards: Venice; Bergamo.)
creator_credit_for_label: ONF | NFB, Norman McLaren and Evelyn Lambart
